text: Mia and the White Lion is a 2018 film about a young girl from London moves to Africa with her parents where she befriends a lion cub. Staring; Daniah De Villiers, Mélanie Laurent, Langley Kirkwood The film released in France on the 26th of December 2018 and the United States of America on the 12th of April 2019. ==Cast== * Daniah De Villiers as Mia Owen * Mélanie Laurent as Alice Owen * Langley Kirkwood as John Owen * Ryan Mac Lennan as Mick Owen. * Lionel Newton as Kavin * Lillian Dube as Jodie * Brandon Auret as Dirk * William Davies as Jack * Kavin Richardson as The Lion Whisper ==References== Category:2018 movies Category:Movies about lions Category:French movies
title: Mia And The White Lion
